title: Victoria Beckham dances around Times Square in a hilarious video
text:
She's returned to New York ahead of the Stateside launch of her beauty range.

And Victoria Beckham was enjoying the sights of Times Square in a hilarious Instagram video on Tuesday, as she took to the streets to show off her dance moves.

The designer, 45, danced with some of the tourists to the Bee Gees hit Staying Alive with the bright lights of New York on full display behind her.

Scroll down for video

Energetic: Victoria Beckham, 45, was enjoying the sights of Times Square in a hilarious Instagram video, as she took to the streets of New York to show off her dance moves

In the fun video, Victoria embraced the disco era with black flares as she strutted down the street still packed with tourists.

The former Spice Girl was joined by a male pal along with groups of tourists, and even busted some moves with a life-size version of the Sesame Street character Elmo.

Luckily plenty of the city's tourists were quick to join in on the fun, as they danced along to the iconic Saturday Night Fever hit.

Victoria captioned the playful video: 'Back in New York!! @victoriabeckhambeauty lip launch today!! xxxx Kisses.'

Fun: The designer, 45, danced with some of the tourists to the Bee Gees hit Staying Alive with the bright lights of the city on full display behind her

Chic: As ever Victoria put on a stylish display in black flares and a white blouse as she danced along the streets of New York

The outing came after Victoria revealed the boozy secret to her healthy lifestyle during a playful appearance on This Morning.

The Spice Girl discussed her penchant for tequila and red wine alongside a balanced lifestyle on the show, saying: 'I try to be really really healthy, I expect a lot of myself and my body.

'I have four kids and work a lot, I try to be healthy, fresh fish, fresh vegetables, fruit and I drink a lot of water.

'I am not saying I’m not fun, I am known to drink a few tequilas and a few red wines, it’s that balance. Working out, but having fun is also super important.'

Friendly: At one point Victoria sweetly embraced one of the Elmos that was patrolling the streets

Bust a move! The star seemed to be having a whale of a time as she danced among the tourists

Hello! Victoria had a bit of fun with one of the Sesame Street characters as she enjoyed the outing in the city

Staying alive! She has travelled to NYC for the Stateside launch of her beauty range

Discussing her tips for good skin, the star added: 'Definitely take make-up off every night before bed, use a really good moisturiser that works for your skin type and stay hydrated!

'I haven’t always had good skin, I pay a lot of attention to my skin, not just on my skin, eating healthy as well and drinking water… basic things that make a difference!

'Using a good moisturiser, making sure my skin is hydrated and changing it up as well, I think is important.'
description: The designer, 45, danced with some of the tourists to the Bee Gees hit Staying Alive with the bright lights of New York on full display behind her in a fun video posted to Instagram.
